chunk_id: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0__chunk_976
source: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0
text:
30 days before delivery
o the dose that the mother received was incorrect, or
o mother did not receive any treatment for syphilis, or
o mother was treated for syphilis with an antibiotic that was not penicillin
Patient allergic to penicillin 
• Do not use Doxycycline or Tetracycline: this contraindicated in pregnancy
• Consider desensitization (see the EML for guide to desensitisation)
• D esensitisation is  best performed in an ICU with emergency resuscitation equipment (including IV line, ECG
